info.name: minimal floating scrollbars for firefox windows
info.description:
windows version of minimal floating scrollbar for firefox mac os x -> http://userstyles.org/styles/83295/minimal-floating-scrollbars-for-firefox-mac-os-x

this one is based on glow scrollbars -> http://userstyles.org/styles/76999/glow-scrollbar

but unlike glow scrolbar it does not make textarea resizer grip disappear

might work on linux too
